column5: Hi Folks....just wondering if anyone has any info on Jumping Caribou Lake...I've heard from some that the fishing is good in the winter and others have told me that the lake is fished out  Thanks...
My daughter got a nine lb walleye out of there in July.  Not this July
Thanks Dara....that's a nice walleye for sure!!
I have fished it a couple of times while staying at Ravenscroft lodge.  Never really got into much fish but had a great time none the less.
pm me ifyou want some info  Bryan

Thanks guys for all the info....Last minute change in plans  .......we've decided to go back to Lake Temagami this year for the 4th annual ice fishing party...5 days of me keeping up with the young lads   ....my son-in-law who flies up from Georgia every year for this event wants to beat his PB Walleye from Temagami that he caught on our 2008 trip  If any other OFC members are up there the end of Feb/beginning of Mar, send me a pm and maybe we can get together..
Always a wise choice to stick with the 'gami...I'm sure it'll be a great trip!  I'm usually there for Trout opener...but if we're up later, I'll check in with you
I know ya do Wayne..  .......I'll be moving around the lake more this year    .....I was talking to a buddy who said that the hub just froze over.....is that right???

-20 or so last night so I bet it did. 4 to 6 inches of ice in our bay and the neighbour (with his leg in a cast) has been out all day packing the (future) ice road to his place and mine from town. Gotta love him....

We stayed at Ravenscroft as well. 7 or so years ago now. My daughter and I got into eyes every night after we found them.  We were drifting over rock to a sand spot and picking them up if we could get through the rocks without a snag. She said. Dad and I looked at her rod and it was bent right over. I said great, a snag already. She looked at me with a little grin and said, nope...its tugging. I watched it for a minute and it never moved, so I said, naw, thats a snag, as it took off and pulled her hands right to the water. It was pretty neat watching her bring that thing in.  16 at the time

Stayed there two years ago fishing sucked! second week of Jan. Asked the operator to move us a few hundred yards and refused. I asked him to drill hole and he said no. I will never go to Ravencroft resort again. Service sucked!
